132.content:
Your name is Timothy Allenson. You're on the short side with a wiry build and typically don't get into trouble, but it's been a bad day. In a stupid attempt to gain a few points with a pretty girl, you took the rap to get her out of trouble...which she repaid by laughing at you and leaving you high and dry as soon as she could. Now you're stuck in detention while she's free and enjoying herself. It's no more than you could expect really, but it still frustrates you. Still, nothing you can do about it now. Might as well just see it through.

You look up as you enter the room and see the teacher, Myrrine Caster at the front of the room. Admittedly, you've not had any trouble with her up 'till now. You'd always attempted to be polite and respectful at least (to the point you have a minor reputation of being "teacher's pet"), so her surprise at seeing your arrival is understandable.

"Mr. Allenson," she says as you take a seat, "and how did you end up here?"

"No good deed goes unpunished," you say with a small smile, but unable to keep the bitterness out of your voice, "seems there's no place for chivalry anymore. Don't worry, Ms. Caster, I'll try not to make this any more unpleasant than it has to be."

Ms. Caster raises an eyebrow, but doesn't make any further comment as the others in detention begin to file in. She fixes most of them with glares and snide remarks, but every now and again she turns on you an odd look as if trying to decide something. After she's got all of those present engaged in meaningless busywork to keep you all quiet, she strolls over to your desk again as if to check your work. However, you soon find that she has something else in mind for you.

Option 1: She shrinks you to just under 4' so she can truly keep you close and protected as "teacher's pet".

Option 2: She offers to let you be her "assistant" for the day in punishing a few of the others present.

134.content:
Emily pushed the door open and entered rather nervously. “Um is this the detention hall?” she asked.

“It is, has been, and always shall be.” The teacher replied with a voice that all but screamed she was not looking forward to the next hour. “Just hand me your detention slip and we’ll be on our way.”

Emily took the slip she’d been given from her stack of books and papers and handed it to the lady. She looked it over, “Emily Reynolds, sophomore, in for tardiness, but otherwise a good student. Well, at least I’ll have one student in here who’ll behave properly. Ms. Caster, I’ll be your supervisor, and for these other… delightful students.” Ms. Caster said.

Emily looked at the other assembled students. There were about half-a-dozen others; boys & girls, and at least one of each social category. And all of them looked like the types to be in detention often. Emily went to a seat at the front, close to Ms. Caster’s desk, everyone else was towards the back so she had plenty of space.

1341.content:
Emily sat down and started working on some of her homework. She was still embarrassed about having to be in such a place, but tried to ignore the other students.

Five minutes passed by slowly, and Ms. Caster was already feeling bored. Save for Emily, the kids obviously did not care that they were in detention, and obviously needed to be taught a lesson. I think I'll have some fun for once, she thought to herself.

Snapping her fingers once, a girl in the back row suddenly shrieked, standing up and looking behind her. Emily couldn't help but stare: the blonde-haired girl was somehow growing what looked to be a black-furred cat tail.

"What the hell?!" the black-haired boy next to her exclaimed.

But the changes continued - she next grew a pair of cat ears atop her head. "Nyoooo!"

"What is all the commotion?!" Ms. Caster shouted form the front. "I thought I made it clear there is to be no talking during detention!"

The cat-eared girl stood still, her hands covering her head. "But - but I'm somehow turning into a cat, Ms. Caster!"

"Well, maybe that will teach you not to end up here so often, Katherine. Now, please, sit back down, and do your work!"

Katherine's ears pinned themselves down, expressing her fright, and she did as told, her new tail swaying back and forth behind her.

Emily could hardly believe what she had just seen, but for some reason, she thought it made for an interesting development. She returned to her homework, already making mental notes to set her alarm clock for the morning.

As Emily reached for her backpack to put away her English reading, she suddenly felt a tingling sensation at the base of her spine. She turned her head in time to see a grey-furred, bushy tail shoot out from the base of her spine. It was about two feet long, and was swaying back and forth, though she wasn't quite sure how she was doing it. Then her head began to itch, and her hearing sudden;y became quite acute as a pair of wolf-like ears sprouted from the top of her head. Her human ears melted into her head, as if they had never been there to begin with.

Emily blushed as she examined her new ears with the hand-mirror from her purse. She had always loved wolves, but didn't know how she felt about becoming one.

The other students in the room were staring. "What's going on here?! What's with all the weird crap going on?" Jamie shouted.

Ms. Caster smirked as an idea came to her. Even though it might not fit her personality, this should still be quite interesting to see her reaction!

Again, with a snap, the changes began to take their effect. Emily set down the book her class was reading, and as she went to reach into her backpack, she noticed something was off. Her arm felt rough, as if it were hardening. Looking closer, she could see what appeared to be ocean-blue scales forming on her wrists and further up both her arms, moving her to her shoulders. Not wanting the other students to notice, she kept her arms to her chest. However, that was about to be a moot point.

Emily's legs pulled themselves together, sticking like someone had poured gorilla glue all over them. They simply would not budge. Then the unfortunate sound of ripping fabric filled the room: her jeans and shoes were being shredded, as her legs now felt like they were melting into one another. Her feet slipped out of her shoes and socks, becoming very thin. Her toes melded into one, and moments later, both feet fused together, forming a pointed tip of what was now a skin-colored tail.

Emily's face was blushing madly, attempting to hide prying eyes from seeing her lower area, her underwear was nothing but pieces of scrap material on the floor. Ms. Caster looked on as the girl's new limb was quick coated over in the same blue scales; it grew longer and longer, until her new tail was at best guess ten feet long.

No one dared say a word, fearing they would be next. Emily simply sat there in her seat, staring at her transformed body. "I'm...half snake now?" She had been a fan of fantasy creatures, but never had she imagined she would be turned into one during detention. Her tail slithered around on the floor as she quickly leaned to maneuver it.

Looks like she's taking it better than the other two, the teacher smiled. Still not thirty-five minutes to go... what kind of trick should I play next?
